thread.title: Listen to Future’s New Self-Titled Album
thread.title_full: Listen to Future’s New Self-Titled Album

author: Pitchfork
title: Listen to Future’s New Self-Titled Album
text:
Listen to Future’s New Self-Titled Album FUTURE follows last year’s EVOL Future Photo by Erika Goldring/Getty Images 
Earlier this week, Future announced a new self-titled album , which follows last year’s EVOL . Listen to the new album in full below. As previously reported , it includes the song “High Demand,” in which Future raps, “We do a whole lotta numbers, yeah/Grab on that pussy like Donald, yeah.” The lyric is in reference to lewd comments Donald Trump made about women, captured in a 2005 recording that was released in the lead-up to the election. Artists In This Story
